name: MagicDatabase
0:
”Alexa, open Magic Database”
”Alexa, ask Magic Database to look for Shock”
”Alexa, ask Magic Database to search for Pathrazer of Ulamog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic database
des:
This is your one stop shop for all your MtG card needs. Find any card you need, and get any bit of information on it.

Portions of this product are unofficial Fan Content permitted under the Wizards of the Coast Fan Content Policy. The literal and graphical information presented here about Magic: The Gathering, including card images, the mana symbols, and Oracle text, is copyright Wizards of the Coast, LLC, a subsidiary of Hasbro, Inc. This product is not produced by, endorsed by, supported by, or affiliated with Wizards of the Coast.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
